item.title: Open Home Office
item.description: Man, it’s been many moons since my last blog post. I’m going to break that dry spell and start posting regularly again, and I thought I’d kick off with a quick one. Here’s a link that’s just too good not to share. Open Home Office (YC S17) Raises $7M To Bring Office Distractions To Remote Workers Nationwide Highlights: Enjoy working from home, but yearn for the interminable stimulation and irritation of an open office?
